CustomField.description: Indicates whether the submitted value matches the current value on Account/Opportunity.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Invoice_Delivery_Method__c ) || ISBLANK( TEXT(Account__r.Invoice_Delivery_Method__c) ), "", IF( Invoice_Delivery_Method__c = TEXT(Account__r.Invoice_Delivery_Method__c), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRcW", "NO") + " " + TEXT(Account__r.Invoice_Delivery_Method__c) ) )
CustomField.label: Match? - Invoice Delivery Method
